Note about this deal
 

ğŸ The Going holiday sale is on! Save up to 40% on gift cards for 1, 3, or 5 years of Going Premium or Elite for a limited time! Shop Gift Cards. ğŸ âœˆï¸


Coming in hot with more from JetBlue's big Travel Tuesday sale, this time we're looking at domestic routes. For a limited time, you can get 35% off select flights with promo code SAVE35.


The sample searches here will take you straight to the JetBlue website with the promo code already entered. If you want a more convenient search option, try searching on Google Flights, filtering for nonstop, JetBlue flights only. Once you've find an option you like, take it over to the JetBlue website sale page, enter the promo code, and you're off to the races. 


We've only listed the very best prices here, but all of JetBlue's nonstop domestic routes are eligible for this sale, as long as they operate within the below timeframe. If you're looking for another route, hop on into the Google Flights Explore map with the JetBlue filter on and see what you can come up with.


Hereâ€™s what to know: book by December 3rd at 11:59pm EST for travel between January 6thâ€“February 11th or February 24thâ€“March 11th (Fridays and Sundays excluded). Itâ€™s valid on nonstop flights only and the sale prices are only bookable on their website. Just note, it doesnâ€™t apply to Mint, transatlantic, Even MoreÂ® Space, or Cash + Points bookings.
